mapper.select: select oll.oli_no, oll.m_no, oll.reg_date, oli.oli_no, oli.title, oli.img_path, oli.price from online_lecture_introduction oli, online_lecture_like oll where oll.m_no = #{m_no} and oli.oli_no = oll.oli_no group by oll.oli_no order by oll.reg_date desc
select count(*) from online_lecture_introduction oli, online_lecture_like oll where oll.m_no = #{m_no} and oli.oli_no = oll.oli_no group by oll.oli_no
